getPortfolioPositions: SELECT position.id, position.purchasedate,position.purchasepriceperunit, position.quantity, product.productname, product.fineweight, producttype.producttypename, product.unitofmeasure, issuingcountry.issuingcountryname, custodyservice.custodyservicename FROM position, product, portfolio, custodyservice, portfolioposition, users, issuingcountry, producttype WHERE portfolioposition.portfolioid = portfolio.id AND position.id = portfolioposition.positionid AND custodyservice.id = position.custodyserviceid AND product.id = position.productid AND portfolio.ownerid = users.id AND issuingcountry.id = product.issuingcountryid AND producttype.id = product.producttypeid AND users.username = 'John Doe'
getPortfolioById: SELECT id, portfolioName, ownerId, createdAt, updatedAt FROM portfolio WHERE id = $1
getOrders: SELECT orders.id, orders.userid, users.username, orders.productid,product.productname,orders.quantity,orders.totalPrice,orders.orderStatus,orders.custodyServiceId,custodyservice.custodyserviceName,orders.createdAt,orders.updatedAt FROM orders JOIN users ON users.id = orders.userid JOIN product ON product.id = orders.productid LEFT JOIN custodyservice ON orders.custodyServiceId = custodyservice.id ORDER BY orders.createdAt DESC
